content.title: The Wolf and the Lion
content.text:
A Wolf, having stolen a lamb from a fold, was carrying him off to his lair.

A Lion met him in the path, and seizing the lamb, took it from him. Standing at a safe distance, the Wolf exclaimed, You have unrighteously taken that which was mine from me!

To which the Lion jeeringly replied, It was righteously yours, eh? The gift of a friend?
content.moral: One thief is no better than another.
